definition: at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Senegal says it will extradite Habre on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 塞內加爾表示將於星期一把哈佈雷引渡回乍得。

sentences.english: Chadian President Idriss Deby says help is not coming soon enough.
sentences.chinese: 乍得總統代比說，協助來得不夠快。

sentences.english: Chad blames Khartoum for backing the rebel Union of Resistance Forces.
sentences.chinese: 乍得指責喀土穆支持叛軍抵抗力量聯盟。

sentences.english: Cameroon and Chad have not reported any cases.
sentences.chinese: 喀麥隆和乍得尚未報告任何病例。

sentences.english: N'Djamena of Chad is ruined by civil war.
sentences.chinese: 乍得的恩賈梅納因爲內戰慘遭破壞。

sentences.english: Tom:N'Djamena of Chad is ruined by civil war.
sentences.chinese: 乍得的恩賈梅納因爲內戰慘遭破壞。

sentences.english: A petroglyph emerges from the sands of the Sahara in Chad.
sentences.chinese: 這是非洲乍得境內撒哈拉大沙漠裏的一塊岩石畫。

sentences.english: Reports say Chad Harbach received over six hundred thousand dollars for the book.
sentences.chinese: 報道說，乍得Harbach收到書超過六十萬美元。

sentences.english: Yang also held talks with his Chadian counterpart Moussa Faki Mahamat.
sentences.chinese: 當日，楊潔篪還與乍得外長法基舉行會談。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
